title: The best women's winter coats under £100
text:
The stylish coats under £100 to shop now. [Photo: Yahoo Style UK]

Yahoo is committed to finding you the best products at the best prices. We may receive a share from purchases made via links on this page.

As the temperature continues to drop it’s time to start shopping for your 2019 autumn/winter wardrobe - the most important staple being a new stylish coat.

From tailored trenches, to bold faux fur, puffer jackets and parkas, choosing a coat this year, as per usual, is no easy task.

READ MORE: 6 of the best waterproof boots for men and women

So, to make things a little bit easier, we’ve searched high and low to find the best coats on the high street for under £100. From checks and cheetah print to timeless muted hues - these are the affordable coats to snap up ASAP before they sell out.

1. Wool Blend Checked Overcoat by M&S | £99

2. Lapels Faux Fur Coat by Mango | £89.99

3. Single Breasted Coat by Warehouse | £79

4. Pink Revere Collar Coat by New Look | £35.99

5. Aviator Jacket by M&S | £69

6. Navy Blue Puffer Coat by Stradivarius | £79.99

7. Check Double Belted Coat by Warehouse | £96

8. Teddy Borg Jacket by Next | £58
description: Shop these stylish coats before they sell out
